translated: Even if you accept that the seed is impaired and produces, then it follows that it would be impermanent.ğŸ”½As it was said,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang smras pa de la /

analyzed: 'pho 'gyur phyir zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //

analyzed: de ni nam mkha'i yul du gnas pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And the sun does not exist in the water, because it is seen in the sky.

original: 'khrul pas de ltar snang ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'khrul pas de ltar snang ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it appears in that way through error,

original: 'o na de lta na shes pa de nyi ma la dmigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'o na de lta na shes pa de nyi ma la dmigs pa ma yin te /
translated: then in that case, that consciousness does not have the sun as its object,

original: nyi ma la chu'i nang na gnas pa'i ngo bo med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyi ma la chu'i nang na gnas pa'i ngo bo med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the sun does not have the nature of existing in the water.

original: de lta yin dang don gyi rang bzhin gang zhig de'i shes pa la mi snang ba ni de'i don gyi ngo bo dang bral ba'i phyir de'i shes pa'i dmigs pa ma yin no zhes bya bar grub po //
analyzed: de lta yin dang don gyi rang bzhin gang zhig de'i shes pa la mi snang ba ni de'i don gyi ngo bo dang bral ba'i phyir de'i shes pa'i dmigs pa ma yin no zhes bya bar grub po //
translated: If that were so, then it is established that whatever nature of an object does not appear to that consciousness is not the object of that consciousness, because it is devoid of the nature of that object.

original: sbyor ba ni gang zhig shes pa gang la snang ba ma yin pa'i rang bzhin de ni shes pa de'i yul ma yin te /
analyzed: sbyor ba ni gang zhig shes pa gang la snang ba ma yin pa'i rang bzhin de ni shes pa de'i yul ma yin te /
translated: The syllogism is: Whatever nature does not appear to a consciousness is not the object of that consciousness,

original: rna ba'i shes pa'i gzugs bzhin no //
analyzed: rna ba'i shes pa'i gzugs bzhin no //
translated: like a form that is not the object of an auditory consciousness.

original: nyi ma yang gzugs brnyan gyi shes pa la snang ba rang bzhin ma yin no zhes bya ba'i khyad par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: nyi ma yang gzugs brnyan gyi shes pa la snang ba rang bzhin ma yin no zhes bya ba'i khyad par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: The sun does not appear in the cognition of the reflection, and the difference is not perceived.

original: gtan tshigs ma grub pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs ma grub pa ni ma yin te /
translated: The reason is not unestablished.

original: nyi ma la chu'i nang na yod pa'i ngo bo med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyi ma la chu'i nang na yod pa'i ngo bo med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the sun does not exist in the water.

original: ma nges pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: ma nges pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it uncertain.

original: ha cang thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: ha cang thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because it is an overextension.

original: de lta na yang ci yang rung bas gang ci yang rung ba'i dmigs par 'gyur ro //ğŸ”½mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa'i phyir 'gal @191a * //
analyzed: de lta na yang ci yang rung bas gang ci yang rung ba'i dmigs par 'gyur ro // mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa'i phyir 'gal @191a * //
translated: In that case, anything can be the object of anything.

original: ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: ba yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it contradictory, because it exists in the similar instance.

original: ci ste yang nyi ma de nyid yul la sogs pa'i bye brag gis gzhan nyid du rtogs pa 'ba' zhig tu zad pas de'i phyir gtan tshigs ma grub pa nyid yin no snyam na /
analyzed: ci ste yang nyi ma de nyid yul la sogs pa'i bye brag gis gzhan nyid du rtogs pa 'ba' zhig tu zad pas de'i phyir gtan tshigs ma grub pa nyid yin no snyam na /
translated: If it is argued that the reason is unestablished because the sun is only conceived to be different due to the differences of place and so on,

original: de nyid gzhan yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni spyi rtol can gyi rtog ge ba khyed cag las gzhan su zhig gis brjod par 'os /
analyzed: de nyid gzhan yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni spyi rtol can gyi rtog ge ba khyed cag las gzhan su zhig gis brjod par 'os /
translated: then who other than you, a conceited sophist, would say that it is different from itself?

original: 'di ltar de nyid ces bya ba 'dis ni rang gi de'i ngo bo bsgrub par brjod la /
analyzed: 'di ltar de nyid ces bya ba 'dis ni rang gi de'i ngo bo bsgrub par brjod la /
translated: In this way, â€œthatnessâ€ expresses the establishment of its own nature,

original: gzhan zhes bya ba 'dis ni de bkag pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba 'dis ni de bkag pa yin no //
translated: and â€œotherâ€ negates that.

original: de ji ltar gcig la gcig gi tshe phan tshun 'gal ba bsgrub pa dang dgag pa gnyis rigs pa yin /
analyzed: de ji ltar gcig la gcig gi tshe phan tshun 'gal ba bsgrub pa dang dgag pa gnyis rigs pa yin /
translated: How could it be logical to establish and negate mutually exclusive things in relation to a single thing?

original: gal te yang gzhan du rtogs na yang de nyid yin par gyur na sna tshogs pa thams cad gcig nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te yang gzhan du rtogs na yang de nyid yin par gyur na sna tshogs pa thams cad gcig nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: Moreover, if one understands â€œotherâ€ as â€œthatness,â€ then all varieties would be a single thing.

original: de lta yin dang yin lhan cig skye ba dang 'jig par 'gyur ba dang / shes pa thams cad kyang yul gcig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta yin dang yin lhan cig skye ba dang 'jig par 'gyur ba dang / shes pa thams cad kyang yul gcig par 'gyur ro //
translated: If that were the case, then arising and disintegration would occur simultaneously, and all consciousnesses would have a single object.

original: de'i phyir ji ltar yul dang dus la sogs pa tha dad pa dang ldan pa'i don 'di nyid gal te kho na ltar 'gyur na /
analyzed: de'i phyir ji ltar yul dang dus la sogs pa tha dad pa dang ldan pa'i don 'di nyid gal te kho na ltar 'gyur na /
translated: Therefore, if this object that possesses differences of place, time, and so on were just that,

original: de lta na de kho na rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ma grub pa ga las yin /
analyzed: de lta na de kho na rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ma grub pa ga las yin /
translated: then since it would be understood as thatness, how could it be unestablished?

original: phyogs gnyis pa rnam pa dang bcas pa la yang rang gi rnam pa rig pa ni phyi rol gyi don dang 'dra ba'i bdag nyid kyi rnam pa nyams su myong ba'i phyir /
analyzed: phyogs gnyis pa rnam pa dang bcas pa la yang rang gi rnam pa rig pa ni phyi rol gyi don dang 'dra ba'i bdag nyid kyi rnam pa nyams su myong ba'i phyir /
translated: In the second case, the cognition of the aspect is the experience of the aspect that is the nature of the object, just as the external object is.

original: phyi rol rig par brjod kyi /
analyzed: phyi rol rig par brjod kyi /
translated: Therefore, it is called the cognition of the external object.

original: mi 'dra ba nyams su myong ba las ni ma yin te /
analyzed: mi 'dra ba nyams su myong ba las ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not the experience of something dissimilar.

original: de lta ma yin na ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro //ğŸ”½'di gzugs brnyan gyi blo nyi ma'i rnam pa dang 'dra ba'i bdag nyid kyi rnam pa nyams su myong ba yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro // 'di gzugs brnyan gyi blo nyi ma'i rnam pa dang 'dra ba'i bdag nyid kyi rnam pa nyams su myong ba yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: If it were, it would follow, absurdly, that everything would be the cognition of everything.

original: de lta ma yin na gzugs brnyan gyi blo nyi ma'i shes pa dang khyad par med par ma 'khrul bar 'gyur ro /ğŸ”½chu la nyi ma'i 'od zer ni //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na gzugs brnyan gyi blo nyi ma'i shes pa dang khyad par med par ma 'khrul bar 'gyur ro / chu la nyi ma'i 'od zer ni //
translated: It is not the case that the cognition of a reflection experiences the aspect that is the nature of the reflection, which is similar to the sun, because if it were, the cognition of a reflection would not be different from the cognition of the sun and would not be mistaken.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras pa de la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras pa de la /
translated: The opponent may say, The rays of the sun in the water and so on.

original: brgyud pa yis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: brgyud pa yis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: To this we reply, It is through a process and so on.

original: rtogs pa yin zhes bya ba ni bdag go //
analyzed: rtogs pa yin zhes bya ba ni bdag go //
translated: The word realized refers to the self.

original: steng du 'jug ces bya ba ni nyi ma steng du gnas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: steng du 'jug ces bya ba ni nyi ma steng du gnas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: â€œAboveâ€ means â€œabove the sun.â€

original: sems zhes bya ba ni bdag go //
analyzed: sems zhes bya ba ni bdag go //
translated: â€œMindâ€ means â€œself.â€

original: 'di skad du bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad du bstan pa yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows:

original: gal te bdag gis brgyud nas gtod pa'i steng na gnas pa'i nyi ma log par rtog pa ma yin na ci'i phyir log pa nyid du mthong gi steng du ma yin /
analyzed: gal te bdag gis brgyud nas gtod pa'i steng na gnas pa'i nyi ma log par rtog pa ma yin na ci'i phyir log pa nyid du mthong gi steng du ma yin /
translated: If the self does not conceive the sun to be inverted, why does it appear inverted and not above?

original: gal te ji ltar gnas pa 'dzin pa de lta na de nyid rtogs par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: gal te ji ltar gnas pa 'dzin pa de lta na de nyid rtogs par 'gyur gyi /
translated: If it grasps it as it is, then it would understand it as it is.

original: gzhan du na ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, it would be absurd.ğŸ”½Thus, it is said:

original: de ltar der gnas pas 'jug phyir //
analyzed: de ltar der gnas pas 'jug phyir //
translated: Because it is engaged in that way,

original: log par 'jug phyir brtad pa yi //
analyzed: log par 'jug phyir brtad pa yi //
translated: it is engaged in the inverted.

original: zhes @191b bya ba la sogs pa gang smras pa de la /
analyzed: zhes @191b bya ba la sogs pa gang smras pa de la /
translated: In response to this, it is said:ğŸ”½If it is located there,

original: de na gnas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de na gnas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: and so on.

original: 'di la rgyu bshad pa ni /
analyzed: 'di la rgyu bshad pa ni /
translated: The explanation of the reason is:

original: gzugs brnyan can gyi rnam shes de //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan can gyi rnam shes de //
translated: The consciousness that has the appearance of the reflection

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: and so on.

original: de dang mi 'dra bar snang phyir //
analyzed: de dang mi 'dra bar snang phyir //
translated: Because it appears in a way that is not similar to that,

original: zhes bya ba ni dngos po'i rkyen bstan pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dngos po'i rkyen bstan pa ste /
translated: This is the teaching of the condition of the object.

original: de dang mi 'dra bar snang ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de dang mi 'dra bar snang ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it appears unlike that.

original: 'di 'bru mang po yang yin no //
analyzed: 'di 'bru mang po yang yin no //
translated: This is also a compound word.

original: sbyor ba ni /
analyzed: sbyor ba ni /
translated: The syllogism is:

original: gang dag dang mi 'dra bar snang ba'i shes pa de ni de la dmigs pa ma yin te /ğŸ”½ro la sogs pa'i shes pa sgra la mi dmigs pa'am /
analyzed: gang dag dang mi 'dra bar snang ba'i shes pa de ni de la dmigs pa ma yin te / ro la sogs pa'i shes pa sgra la mi dmigs pa'am /
translated: The cognition that appears unlike that does not perceive it,ğŸ”½like the cognition of taste, etc., does not perceive sound,

original: sgra'i shes pa ro la mi dmigs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: sgra'i shes pa ro la mi dmigs pa bzhin no //
translated: or like the cognition of sound does not perceive taste.

original: gzugs brnyan gyi blo dag ni byad la sogs pa dang mi 'dra ba snang ba yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa 'gal ba dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan gyi blo dag ni byad la sogs pa dang mi 'dra ba snang ba yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa 'gal ba dmigs pa'o //
translated: The cognitions of reflections appear unlike the face, etc. This is the observation of the contradiction with the pervasion.

original: 'di'i ma grub pa nyid yang spang ba'i phyir /ğŸ”½gang phyir me long chung ngu la //
analyzed: 'di'i ma grub pa nyid yang spang ba'i phyir / gang phyir me long chung ngu la //
translated: In order to avoid the nonestablishment of this,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he says, â€œBecause in a small mirror, etc.â€

original: me long chung ngu la byed chen po'i gdong bzhin du chung bar snang la /
analyzed: me long chung ngu la byed chen po'i gdong bzhin du chung bar snang la /
translated: In a small mirror, a large face appears small.

original: shing la sogs pa yang chur bying ba dang yal gal sogs pa thur du bltas par rtogs so //
analyzed: shing la sogs pa yang chur bying ba dang yal gal sogs pa thur du bltas par rtogs so //
translated: and the trees, etc., are perceived as being submerged in the water and as having their branches pointing downward.

original: de bzhin du byad phyir log pa dang chu la sogs pa gting du zhugs par dmigs te /
analyzed: de bzhin du byad phyir log pa dang chu la sogs pa gting du zhugs par dmigs te /
translated: In the same way, the reflection of a face is perceived as being turned away from oneself and as being submerged in the water, etc.

original: de ltar byad la sogs pa gzugs gnas pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar byad la sogs pa gzugs gnas pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Thus, the face, etc., are not the location of the reflection.

original: de bzhin du ral gri la sogs pa'i rten gyi bye brag gi gzugs brnyan ring po la sogs pa'i bye brag gi rnam par snang ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du ral gri la sogs pa'i rten gyi bye brag gi gzugs brnyan ring po la sogs pa'i bye brag gi rnam par snang ste /
translated: In the same way, the reflection of a form, such as a sword, etc., appears as having the particular aspects of length, etc.,

original: de bzhin du gzugs ring po la sogs pa'i bye brag dang ldan pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzugs ring po la sogs pa'i bye brag dang ldan pa ma yin no //
translated: but the form, such as the sword, etc., does not have the particular aspects of length, etc.

original: de ltar na shes pa'i de dang mi 'dra bar snang ba nyid ma grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na shes pa'i de dang mi 'dra bar snang ba nyid ma grub pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, the appearance of the reflection as not being like the cognition is not established.

original: ma nges pa yang spang ba'i phyir //
analyzed: ma nges pa yang spang ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to reject the uncertainty, he says:

original: mi mthun pa ni snang ba yis //ğŸ”½zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: mi mthun pa ni snang ba yis // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The appearance of the dissimilar

original: shes pa thams cad kyi yul thams cad yin par thal ba ni gnod pa can gyi tshad ma'o //
analyzed: shes pa thams cad kyi yul thams cad yin par thal ba ni gnod pa can gyi tshad ma'o //
translated: The consequence that all objects would be the objects of all cognitions is the invalidating means of valid knowledge.

original: ji ltar sor mos cung zad man na //
analyzed: ji ltar sor mos cung zad man na //
translated: Just as the fingers touch the spaceğŸ”½between them, so too the mind touches the object.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang smras pa de yang 'di nyid kyis bsal ba yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang smras pa de yang 'di nyid kyis bsal ba yin te /
translated: This is also refuted by the previous argument.

original: de yang yul med pa yin pa'i phyir ro //ğŸ”½du ma'i yul du 'jug pa yi //
analyzed: de yang yul med pa yin pa'i phyir ro // du ma'i yul du 'jug pa yi //
translated: And that is because the object does not exist.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang smras pa de la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang smras pa de la /
translated: The opponent says: The mind engages in a manifold object.

original: 'dir ni gzugs brnyan 'byung ba nyid //
analyzed: 'dir ni gzugs brnyan 'byung ba nyid //
translated: To this we reply: The arising of a reflection

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: is not like that.

original: gzugs brnyan dngos po nyid yin pa ni /ğŸ”½lus can tha dad min yul phyir //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan dngos po nyid yin pa ni / lus can tha dad min yul phyir //
translated: The existence of a reflection as a real entity

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas sngar bkag zin to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas sngar bkag zin to //
translated: has already been refuted earlier, with arguments such as:ğŸ”½The body is not different from the object.

original: gzugs brnyan dngos por yod pa yin du chug mod de ltan yang de mtshungs pa'i blo'i rtogs par bya ba @192a * //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan dngos por yod pa yin du chug mod de ltan yang de mtshungs pa'i blo'i rtogs par bya ba @192a * //
translated: Even if one maintained that a reflection is a real entity, it is not established as the object of a cognition that is similar to it.

original: nyid du ma grub po zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: nyid du ma grub po zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: To demonstrate this, CandrakÄ«rti writes:

original: du ma'i yul du 'jug pa'o //ğŸ”½zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: du ma'i yul du 'jug pa'o // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The mind engages in a manifold object.

original: sogs pa'i sgras ring ba la sogs pa'i bye brag yongs su gzung ngo //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ring ba la sogs pa'i bye brag yongs su gzung ngo //
translated: The phrase â€œand so onâ€ includes such distinctions as â€œdistantâ€ and â€œnear.â€

original: yang ci ste rigs pa la sogs pa'i bye brag yod na yang sngon po la sogs pa 'ga' zhig gis chos mtshungs pa'i phyir blo mtshungs pa'i rtogs par bya ba nyid yod pa yin no snyam na /
analyzed: yang ci ste rigs pa la sogs pa'i bye brag yod na yang sngon po la sogs pa 'ga' zhig gis chos mtshungs pa'i phyir blo mtshungs pa'i rtogs par bya ba nyid yod pa yin no snyam na /
translated: But if you think that even though there is a difference in terms of type and so on, there is a similarity in terms of some quality, such as being blue, and so there is a single cognition,

original: de ltar na yang don dam pa'i gcig nyid grub pa ma yin la /
analyzed: de ltar na yang don dam pa'i gcig nyid grub pa ma yin la /
translated: then even so, there is no establishment of ultimate singularity.

original: brtags pa nyid du 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: brtags pa nyid du 'gyur gyi /
translated: It would be merely imagined.

original: de la yang grub pa la yang sgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: de la yang grub pa la yang sgrub pa yin no //
translated: And it would be the establishment of what is already established.

original: ci ste yang yul la sogs pa'i bye brag gis tha dad na yang don dam par gcig nyid du 'gyur na /
analyzed: ci ste yang yul la sogs pa'i bye brag gis tha dad na yang don dam par gcig nyid du 'gyur na /
translated: But if, even though there is a difference in terms of object and so on, there is ultimate singularity,

original: de'i tshe bram ze dang gdol pa nyid kyang mi nyid du mtshungs pa'i phyir gcig nyid du 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du bud med nyid du 'dra bas ma dang / rang gi chung ma dang / rang gi kha dang / bshang ba'i lam yang sa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir gcig nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe bram ze dang gdol pa nyid kyang mi nyid du mtshungs pa'i phyir gcig nyid du 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du bud med nyid du 'dra bas ma dang / rang gi chung ma dang / rang gi kha dang / bshang ba'i lam yang sa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir gcig nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: then at that time, even a brahmin and an outcaste would be the same because of being the same in being human, and likewise, a mother, oneâ€™s own wife, oneâ€™s own mouth, and oneâ€™s own anus would be the same because of being similar in being female and because of being the same in being earth.

original: sna tshogs thams cad dngos po nyid yin pa'i phyir lhan cig skye ba dang 'jig pa la sogs par thal bar 'gyur ba yang bzlog par dka' ba nyid do //
analyzed: sna tshogs thams cad dngos po nyid yin pa'i phyir lhan cig skye ba dang 'jig pa la sogs par thal bar 'gyur ba yang bzlog par dka' ba nyid do //
translated: Since the various things are real, it is difficult to avoid the absurd conclusion that they are produced and destroyed simultaneously.

original: gang yang 'di skad du bshad pa las /
analyzed: gang yang 'di skad du bshad pa las /
translated: And in the same way,

original: ci ste yang gcig yin na yul du mar cig car mthong ba mi 'thad do snyam na /
analyzed: ci ste yang gcig yin na yul du mar cig car mthong ba mi 'thad do snyam na /
translated: If you think that it is not tenable that a single thing is seen as many objects simultaneously,

original: lha rnams dga' ba nyi ma la ltos shig / gang gcig yin na yul du mar gnas pa lta bur mngon te /
analyzed: lha rnams dga' ba nyi ma la ltos shig / gang gcig yin na yul du mar gnas pa lta bur mngon te /
translated: look at the sun, which is one, but appears as many in water.

original: thag ring ba'i phyir 'di'i yul la nges par mi zin te /
analyzed: thag ring ba'i phyir 'di'i yul la nges par mi zin te /
translated: Since it is far away, its object is not ascertained.

original: des na 'khrul ba yin no //
analyzed: des na 'khrul ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is an error.

original: de bzhin du sgra la yang 'khrul ba'i phyir yul nges par ma zin na zhes bshad do //
analyzed: de bzhin du sgra la yang 'khrul ba'i phyir yul nges par ma zin na zhes bshad do //
translated: In the same way, sound is also an error, because its object is not ascertained.

original: 'dir bshad pa ni nyi ma bdag gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa ni nyi ma bdag gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Here, the explanation is â€œThe sun is mine,â€ and so on.

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur ba las ma dmigs pa'i phyir med pa nges pas bdag nyid du grub pa'i sgo nas nyi ma bdag gi steng na gnas so snyam pa 'di 'khrul ba'i shes par nges par gzung ste /
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur ba las ma dmigs pa'i phyir med pa nges pas bdag nyid du grub pa'i sgo nas nyi ma bdag gi steng na gnas so snyam pa 'di 'khrul ba'i shes par nges par gzung ste /
translated: Because of the ascertainment of nonexistence, which is due to the nonapprehension of a second orb of the sun, which is the characteristic of an object of perception, it is ascertained that the cognition that the sun is above me is a mistaken cognition.

original: gang gis yul tha dad pas tha dad pa nyid 'khrul bar 'gyur ba de ltar sgra gcig pa nyid du grub pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gis yul tha dad pas tha dad pa nyid 'khrul bar 'gyur ba de ltar sgra gcig pa nyid du grub pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Since the difference of the object is the cause of the difference of the cognition, the identity of the sound is not established.

original: gcig nyid du grub pa na de bzhin du tha dad pa nyid 'khrul bar 'gyur na de nyid ma grub pa'i phyir 'di ni ci yang ma yin no //
analyzed: gcig nyid du grub pa na de bzhin du tha dad pa nyid 'khrul bar 'gyur na de nyid ma grub pa'i phyir 'di ni ci yang ma yin no //
translated: If the identity were established, then the difference would be mistaken, but since that is not established, this is nothing at all.

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'di yin pas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro zhes bya ba de ni sngar bshad zin to //
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'di yin pas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro zhes bya ba de ni sngar bshad zin to //
translated: This is the orb of the sun, therefore it is the orb of the sun. That was explained earlier.

original: 'on te ngo shes pas sgra yang gcig pa nyid du grub @192b ba ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te ngo shes pas sgra yang gcig pa nyid du grub @192b ba ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: But isnâ€™t the identity of the sound established by recognition?

original: de ltar sgra ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smros te /
analyzed: de ltar sgra ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smros te /
translated: To that he says, â€œIn that way, the sound . . .â€ and so on.

original: ngo shes pa tshang ma nyid ma yin par sngar bstan zin pa'i phyir ro snyam du bsams pa yin no //
analyzed: ngo shes pa tshang ma nyid ma yin par sngar bstan zin pa'i phyir ro snyam du bsams pa yin no //
translated: The thought is that all those who are recognized are not the self, because it has already been explained above.

original: cig car bas du ma nyid du grub par ston pa ni /
analyzed: cig car bas du ma nyid du grub par ston pa ni /
translated: The demonstration that the many are established as being simultaneous is as follows:

original: gang tshe smras pa po mang bo //
analyzed: gang tshe smras pa po mang bo //
translated: When there are many speakers,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: and so on.

original: gsal bar zhes bya ba ni myur ba dang bar ma dang dal ba la sogs pa'i bye brag gis so sor snang ba'i phyir ro //ğŸ”½rim gyis kyang bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gsal bar zhes bya ba ni myur ba dang bar ma dang dal ba la sogs pa'i bye brag gis so sor snang ba'i phyir ro // rim gyis kyang bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: The word clearly is because of the appearance of the individual [sounds] by the distinctions of fast, medium, slow, and so on.

original: rim gyis kyang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: rim gyis kyang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In order to demonstrate that [the many are established as being simultaneous] gradually, [the root text] states, Even gradually, and so on.

original: mngon sum 'ba' zhig ces bya ba ni de'i tshe yang drug skyes la sogs pa'i bye brag gis gsal bar snang ba tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon sum 'ba' zhig ces bya ba ni de'i tshe yang drug skyes la sogs pa'i bye brag gis gsal bar snang ba tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The word only is because even at that time, there is a difference in the appearance of the individual [sounds] by the distinctions of the six sense faculties and so on.

original: 'di ni gsal bar byed pa tha dad pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni gsal bar byed pa tha dad pa ni ma yin te /
translated: This is not a difference in the manifestation.

original: de sngar bsal zin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de sngar bsal zin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that has already been refuted earlier.

original: rtags las kyang zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pa las kyang zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rtags las kyang zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pa las kyang zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The word also means even from inference.

original: sbyor ba ni gang zhig gang gi tshe mi 'byung ba de'i tshe de rgyu ma tshang ba med pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sbyor ba ni gang zhig gang gi tshe mi 'byung ba de'i tshe de rgyu ma tshang ba med pa ma yin te /
translated: The application is this: when something does not occur at a certain time, at that time its cause is not complete.

original: dper na gzugs dang snang ba dang yid la byed pa la sogs pa'i rkyen gyi tshogs yod na yang mig ma tshang ba la mig gi rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na gzugs dang snang ba dang yid la byed pa la sogs pa'i rkyen gyi tshogs yod na yang mig ma tshang ba la mig gi rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba bzhin no //
translated: For example, even when the collection of conditions such as form, light, and attention are present, if the eye is not complete, the eye consciousness does not occur.

original: yi ge gcig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa skyes pa'i dus na yang dus phyis 'byung ba de las byung ba nyid du mngon par 'bod pa'i rnam par byed pa mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: yi ge gcig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa skyes pa'i dus na yang dus phyis 'byung ba de las byung ba nyid du mngon par 'bod pa'i rnam par byed pa mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: And when a consciousness such as a single letter is produced, the subsequent occurrence of the consciousness that expresses it does not occur. This is the non-observation of a pervasion.

original: rgyu ma tshang ba med pa la 'byung bar 'gyur bas khyab pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: rgyu ma tshang ba med pa la 'byung bar 'gyur bas khyab pa'i phyir la /
translated: Because it is pervaded by the occurrence of a complete cause,

original: de yang 'di la med pa /
analyzed: de yang 'di la med pa /
translated: and that does not exist here.

original: 'on te spyir rgyu ma tshang ba med pa tsam dgag pa sgrub na grub pa la sgrub pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: 'on te spyir rgyu ma tshang ba med pa tsam dgag pa sgrub na grub pa la sgrub pa nyid yin te /
translated: But if in general the mere non-observation of a complete cause is established, then it is just the establishment of what is already established.

original: 'di ltar sgra rtag pa rgyu nyid yin na yang lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu ma tshang ba'i phyir gzhan gyis dus phyis 'byung ba'i shes pa rnams mi bskyed par 'dod pa kho na'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar sgra rtag pa rgyu nyid yin na yang lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu ma tshang ba'i phyir gzhan gyis dus phyis 'byung ba'i shes pa rnams mi bskyed par 'dod pa kho na'o //
translated: Thus, even though sound is permanent, it is accepted that it does not generate other consciousnesses that occur later because the assemblage of its causes is incomplete.

original: ci ste sgra zhes bya ba'i rgyu'i khyad par gyis rgyu ma tshang ba med pa gang yin pa de dag dgag pa bsgrub pa na de'i tshe gtan tshigs ma nges pa dang dpe yang bsgrub par bya ba ma tshang ba yin te /
analyzed: ci ste sgra zhes bya ba'i rgyu'i khyad par gyis rgyu ma tshang ba med pa gang yin pa de dag dgag pa bsgrub pa na de'i tshe gtan tshigs ma nges pa dang dpe yang bsgrub par bya ba ma tshang ba yin te /
translated: But if you assert that the specific causes called â€œsoundâ€ are not incomplete, then when you prove a negation, the reason is indeterminate and the example is incomplete.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa sgra'i rgyu ma tshang ba'i phyir mi 'byung ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa sgra'i rgyu ma tshang ba'i phyir mi 'byung ba ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not that the eye consciousness does not arise because the causes of sound are incomplete.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: mig ma tshang ba las so zhe na /
analyzed: mig ma tshang ba las so zhe na /
translated: It is because the eye is incomplete.

original: 'di ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.

original: spyir bsgrub par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: spyir bsgrub par bya ba yin la /
translated: The general is to be proven.

original: grub pa la sgrub pa yang ma yin /
analyzed: grub pa la sgrub pa yang ma yin /
translated: It is not that what is established is proven.

original: 'di ltar gal te rtag pa rgyu gzhan la ltos pa srid par gyur na de'i tshe grub pa la sgrub par 'gyur na /
analyzed: 'di ltar gal te rtag pa rgyu gzhan la ltos pa srid par gyur na de'i tshe grub pa la sgrub par 'gyur na /
translated: Thus, if it is possible that a permanent thing relies on other causes, then it would be that what is established is proven.

original: gang gi tshe de @193a * //
analyzed: gang gi tshe de @193a * //
translated: When that is not possible,

original: nyid srid pa ma yin te /
analyzed: nyid srid pa ma yin te /
translated: then that is not possible.

original: de ni des phan gdags par byas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni des phan gdags par byas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is not benefited by that.

original: phan 'dogs na ltos par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: phan 'dogs na ltos par 'gyur gyi /

original: de lta ma yin na ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: But if it is not so, there is an absurd consequence.

original: de lta bas na ltos pa med pa'i sgra rgyu nyid du khas len pa na de las byung ba'i shes pa thams cad rgyu ma tshang ba nyid med pa yin pa'i phyir rtag tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bas na ltos pa med pa'i sgra rgyu nyid du khas len pa na de las byung ba'i shes pa thams cad rgyu ma tshang ba nyid med pa yin pa'i phyir rtag tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, when one accepts that a sound that is not dependent is a cause, then all consciousnesses that arise from that are not incomplete causes, and therefore they would always arise.

original: de med pa na de mi 'byung ba'i shes pa sgra de nyid ma tshang ba med pa nyid du ston par byed pa'i phyir ji ltar grub pa la sgrub pa yin /
analyzed: de med pa na de mi 'byung ba'i shes pa sgra de nyid ma tshang ba med pa nyid du ston par byed pa'i phyir ji ltar grub pa la sgrub pa yin /
translated: Since that which is not that does not arise, the consciousness that is not incomplete with regard to that sound demonstrates that it is not incomplete. Therefore, how can it be established by that which is already established?

original: khyad par du rgyu ma tshang ba bsgrub na yang nges pa nyid ma yin la /
analyzed: khyad par du rgyu ma tshang ba bsgrub na yang nges pa nyid ma yin la /
translated: Even if one establishes a specific incomplete cause, it is not ascertained.

original: dpe bsgrub par bya ba ma tshang ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: dpe bsgrub par bya ba ma tshang ba yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is the example incomplete with regard to the probandum.

original: 'di ltar don 'di brjod par 'dod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar don 'di brjod par 'dod pa yin te /

analyzed: gang zhig yod kyang gang mi 'byung ba de ni yang dag par de'i rgyu ma yin te /

analyzed: dper na mig gi rnam par shes pa sgra yod kyang mi 'byung ba bzhin no //
translated: just as the auditory consciousness does not arise even when sound exists.

original: yi ge ga la sogs pa sgra'i rang gi ngo bo khyad par yod pa na yang de las 'byung bar 'dod pa'i shes pa mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni khyad par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: yi ge ga la sogs pa sgra'i rang gi ngo bo khyad par yod pa na yang de las 'byung bar 'dod pa'i shes pa mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni khyad par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: Even when there is a difference in the nature of the sound, such as the letter â€œga,â€ the cognition that is held to arise from it does not arise. This is a non-observation of a difference-maker.

analyzed: 'di yang rtag pa la ltos pa mi 'thad pa ni ldog pa la gnod pa can gyi tshad ma'o //

analyzed: sbyang na yod pa sa bon la sogs pas 'khrul ba yang ma yin te /

original: spros pas chog go //
analyzed: spros pas chog go //

original: sgra tsam gsal byed rag las phyir //
analyzed: sgra tsam gsal byed rag las phyir //
translated: Because the mere sound depends on the manifestor,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang sngar smras pa de ni zhar la sun phyung nas rtag pa rnams kyi gsal bar byed pa yod na yang phyogs 'di skyon can nyid yin no zhes bstan par 'dod nas sun dbyung ba'i phyir /ğŸ”½sgra tsam gsal byed la rag las //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang sngar smras pa de ni zhar la sun phyung nas rtag pa rnams kyi gsal bar byed pa yod na yang phyogs 'di skyon can nyid yin no zhes bstan par 'dod nas sun dbyung ba'i phyir / sgra tsam gsal byed la rag las //
translated: Even if there is a clarifier of the permanent, this position is still faulty.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /

analyzed: sgra gsal bar byed pa la rag las nas 'dzin pa na de ci'i phyir ji ltar 'di na nam mkha' ji srid par gnas pa de bzhin du mi 'dzin /

original: de ltar na de 'dzin par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de ltar na de 'dzin par 'gyur gyi /

analyzed: gzhan du na ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes sngar bshad zin to //

analyzed: sgra nam mkha' ji snyed par 'dzin pa yang ma yin la /

analyzed: de ni sgra tsam gyi ngor byas nas sgra thos par yang rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: It is also not tenable to say that sound is heard by taking mere sound as the object.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /

original: thos pa 'di gang yin pa'i sgra de nyid la rjes su byed par rigs pa yin pa de lta na de'i 'di grub par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: thos pa 'di gang yin pa'i sgra de nyid la rjes su byed par rigs pa yin pa de lta na de'i 'di grub par 'gyur gyi /

original: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du ni ma yin no //

analyzed: de lta yin dang / bum pa la sogs pa bzhin du bdag nyid thams cad @193b kyis snang bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don to //

original: de phyir zhes bya ba de ltar bas na'o //
analyzed: de phyir zhes bya ba de ltar bas na'o //
translated: â€œThereforeâ€ means â€œbecause of that.â€

original: 'di thams cad kyang rtag pa nyid kyi gsal bar byed pa khas blangs nas brjod pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /ğŸ”½'di skad brjod pa thams cad ni //
analyzed: 'di thams cad kyang rtag pa nyid kyi gsal bar byed pa khas blangs nas brjod pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir / 'di skad brjod pa thams cad ni //

original: gsal ba mi rung phyir zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa dang tha mi dad kyis so //ğŸ”½yul gyi dbye bas tha dad nyid //
analyzed: gsal ba mi rung phyir zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa dang tha mi dad kyis so // yul gyi dbye bas tha dad nyid //
translated: â€œBecause the manifestation is not tenableâ€ means because of being different or not different.ğŸ”½â€œBecause of the difference of the object, there is differenceâ€ and so on.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa la de nyid 'di yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa la de nyid 'di yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: â€œThat itselfâ€ and so on.

original: des zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir ro //
translated: â€œBy thatâ€ means â€œbecause of that.â€

original: dper na lha sbyin gcig rim gyis //
analyzed: dper na lha sbyin gcig rim gyis //
translated: For example, â€œone Devadatta gradually . . . â€

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In regard to this, it is said:

original: la la gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /ğŸ”½mi rtag pa ni yul gzhan du skye ba nyid 'gro ba yin gyi /
analyzed: la la gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te / mi rtag pa ni yul gzhan du skye ba nyid 'gro ba yin gyi /
translated: â€œSomeone . . . â€

original: rtag pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rtag pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Impermanence is going, i.e., being born in another place, but not permanence.

original: yul gcig na gnas pa'i rang bzhin ma btang bar yul gzhan du 'gro bar mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul gcig na gnas pa'i rang bzhin ma btang bar yul gzhan du 'gro bar mi rung ba'i phyir ro //

analyzed: btang na yang rtag pa nyid nyams par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //

analyzed: 'di nyid ston pa ni /

analyzed: snga ma'i yul dang ma bral ba'i //
translated: â€œWithout being separated from the previous place . . . â€

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: and so on.

original: dper na sa ni cher rkos na //
analyzed: dper na sa ni cher rkos na //

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

original: nam mkha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa ste /
analyzed: nam mkha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa ste /
translated: and so on.

analyzed: reg bya med pa tsam nyid la de gdags pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /

analyzed: nam mkha'i dngos po nyid yin na yang mngon par gsal bar rigs pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /

analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //

original: don dang 'brel ba ma mthong ba'i //
